thread.title: ‘Follow Lucas Duda’: Top 5 videos from MLB’s best Instagram
thread.title_full: ‘Follow Lucas Duda’: Top 5 videos from MLB’s best Instagram | New York Post

author: Laura Molinari
title: ‘Follow Lucas Duda’: Top 5 videos from MLB’s best Instagram
text:
How are the Mets keeping it light before the team’s biggest game in a decade? By Following Lucas Duda, of course.
The Mets trio of Curtis Granderson, John Mayberry Jr. and Danny Muno started an Instagram account called @WeFollowLucasDuda , which documents the daily life of the first baseman in the clubhouse: Duda eating lunch, Duda at batting practice, Duda lifting weights. Few moments have gone undocumented, leaving fans with amusing exchanges between Granderson and “the Duda man,” as he’s called in some of the videos.
Mayberry and Muno are no longer with the Mets as they prepare for Game 1 of the NLDS against the Dodgers on Friday night, but the videos have kept coming. In almost three months, the account has become one of the more entertaining baseball ones on Instagram — and a huge hit with over 43,000 followers. The account shows a different side of the reserved and soft-spoken player.
Here are the five best videos:
